item.title: Apple Finally Destroyed Steve Jobs’ Vision of the iPad. Good

item.title: Tim Cook Has Now Been Apple's CEO for Longer Than Steve Jobs
item.description: Tim Cook has now served as Apple’s chief executive officer (CEO) for longer Steve Jobs’ entire tenure, including the latter’s time as interim CEO. Steve Jobs served as Apple’s CEO across two distinct
